entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Mont-Saint-Hilaire
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:45 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Hubert Airport 10:49 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.0°C
Pressure: 98.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: E 35 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this afternoon. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
